ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Imbrued gloves?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... VoV most likely (unless the Horn + Beserkers gives a significantly larger AC boost and your group s damage is mostly non-melee).  But most bards are going
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 9 Mar 2000, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> true but when you hit 50 will you be using Beserker's with a horn over VoV
> with weapons or another instrument?

VoV most likely (unless the Horn + Beserkers gives a
significantly larger AC boost and your group's damage is
mostly non-melee). But most bards are going on dragon raids
starting in their early 40s - bards and clerics seem to be the
two classes who are readily accepted at these despite their
low level. They have a good chance of getting the Horn long
before they reach level 50.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
